sentences.en: A packed bed of granular material sandwiched by two perforated plates, is a good distributor.
sentences.cn: 两块孔板中间填有一层颗粒物料, 是一种很好的分布板.

sentences.en: Certain granular solids transform into highly mobile slurries.
sentences.cn: 一定数量的粒状固体就可以变成非常易流动的泥浆.

sentences.en: Cotton candy is filamentous, but it is a granular crystal - sugar produced.
sentences.cn: 棉花糖虽然是丝状的, 但是它是用一种颗粒状的晶体 -- 蔗糖制作而成.

sentences.en: Electrostatically, enhanced granular bed filter ( EGB ) is a modern filter.
sentences.cn: 静电增强颗粒层除尘器 ( EGB ) 是一种新型高效除尘器.

sentences.en: Examples of successful application improvements are low volume sprays, foams, and granular soil applications.
sentences.cn: 成功的应用实例包括少量喷撒 、 泡沫剂及农药颗粒剂的土壤施用.

sentences.en: Granular deposits usually have a light tone.
sentences.cn: 粒状堆积物通常具有浅的色调.

sentences.en: Granular systems of 2 kinds of size granular compositions were considered.
sentences.cn: 考虑由2种不同大小颗粒组成的体系,给出了体系的哈密顿量和配分函数.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the antipyretic, analgesic and antiinflammatory effects of xiaoerkanggan granular.
sentences.cn: 目的观察小儿抗感颗粒的解热 、 镇痛、抗炎作用.

sentences.en: Specific Property : white prill granular powder or flake, suck up moisture.
sentences.cn: 特征: 白色粒状、球状、粉状或片状, 易吸潮.

sentences.en: The investigation was extended to the study of a three - dimensional granular medium.
sentences.cn: 将这项研究推广到对三维颗粒状介质的考察.

sentences.en: The ore mainly has cyclopean granular texture and massive and laminar structures.
sentences.cn: 矿石以镶嵌粒状变晶结构,块状和纹层状构造为主.

sentences.en: The ores have crystalline granular and metasomatic textures and disseminated structure.
sentences.cn: 矿石主要是结晶粒状与交代溶蚀结构,浸染状构造.

sentences.en: The photosphere has a granular structure.
The substance is hard and granular.
sentences.cn: 该物质地坚硬,呈颗粒状.

sentences.en: Under electron microscopy, granular siderosomes are present within cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 电子显微镜下见色素颗粒堆积于细胞质内.

words.tran_cn: 形成颗粒；表面变得粗糙（granulate的过去分词）
使成粒状；使表面变粗糙
